response.original_title: Living on the Land: Three Acres at Bicker Fen
response.overview: On a raw November day John Butler moved into his inheritance: a house and enough land to make a good paddock. He took a pitchfork and started to dig. He interviewed a lady named Shirley and married her. Together they make a living from the three acres with persistent but easy-paced toil, and prayer and meditation at dawn and sunset.
response.tagline: A good farmer leaves the land better than he found it.
response.title: Living on the Land: Three Acres at Bicker Fen
